u_username,
u_password,
u_nickname,
u_avatar,

u_status,

mapper.update:
update user
u_username = #{uUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
u_password = #{uPassword,jdbcType=CHAR},
u_nickname = #{uNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
u_avatar = #{uAvatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
u_email = #{uEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
u_phone = #{uPhone,jdbcType=CHAR},
u_points = #{uPoints,jdbcType=INTEGER},
u_date = #{uDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
u_status = #{uStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set u_username = #{uUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_password = #{uPassword,jdbcType=CHAR}, u_nickname = #{uNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_avatar = #{uAvatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_email = #{uEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, u_phone = #{uPhone,jdbcType=CHAR}, u_points = #{uPoints,jdbcType=INTEGER}, u_date = #{uDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, u_status = #{uStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where u_id = #{uId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
